objects.specification: A large rectangular trade-show floor panel with a smooth, light-gray matte finish. The surface is slightly textured for traction and has minimal thickness with crisp beveled edges, ideal for high foot traffic.
A 3-meter high, 0.1-meter thick white painted wall panel with a seamless modern finish, suitable for hanging graphics and signage. Edges are crisp and corners form perfect right angles.

children.specification: A long narrow fabric banner featuring automotive-themed graphics in red, black, and white. It has a slight textile texture, hemmed edges, and metal grommets for hanging along the upper wall edge.

objects.specification: A 3-meter high, 0.1-meter thick white painted wall panel matching the front wall, with a smooth modern surface for mounting displays and graphics.

children.specification: A long narrow fabric banner with high-contrast automotive graphics in red, black, and white, finished with hemmed edges and mounting grommets.

objects.specification: A side wall panel, 3 meters tall and 0.1 meters thick, painted in crisp white with a smooth finish, ideal for attaching signage and decoration.

children.specification: A long fabric banner in red, black, and white with automotive motifs, featuring a fine fabric texture and reinforced eyelets for hanging.
A glossy promotional poster featuring high-resolution automotive branding and imagery, mounted on rigid backing with a thin black frame.

objects.specification: A side wall panel identical to the left wall, 3 meters high with a smooth white finish, perfect for display mounting.

children.specification: A colorful automotive-themed fabric banner in red, black, and white, with reinforced edges and hanging grommets.
A high-gloss promotional poster showcasing automotive imagery and branding, mounted in a sleek black frame.

objects.specification: A realistic mid-size sedan model with accurate proportions: 4.5m long, 2m wide, 1.4m tall. It features a glossy metallic paint finish, tinted windows, detailed headlights and taillights, chrome rim wheels, and visible door handles.
A sleek rectangular registration podium with a brushed metallic gray finish. It has clean straight edges, lightly rounded corners, and a smooth counter surface for brochures and badges.
A slim freestanding information display panel, 1.5m tall and 0.75m wide, with a matte black bezel and sturdy base. The surface is designed to reduce glare.
A matching slim information display panel with a black matte bezel, modern base, and anti-glare screen surface.
A small round visitor table with a clean white tabletop, slender metal pedestal support, and circular base in a minimalist style.

children.specification: A contemporary visitor chair with ergonomic backrest, cushioned seat, and four slender powder-coated metal legs, sized for comfort.
